title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for (0, 35)

1 point is earned for (45, 50)

1 point is earned for the reason

Acceleration is positive on (0, 35) and (45, 50) because the velocity v(t) is increasing on [0, 35] and [45, 50]

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
